decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The erection of rear roof extension with x1 side window would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The insertion of x2 rooflights to front roofslope would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - INFORMATIVE: The applicant is advised that the side window inserted at roof level must be obscure-glazed and non-opening for the parts of the window which can be opened above 1.7 metres from the floor of the room in which the window is installed and proposed windows shall be finished in materials of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in this case white framed, in order to comply with B.2 (a) and (c), Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the GPDO 2015 (as amended).

Condition : 4 - INFORMATIVE
Building Regulations 
Please note that this is a planning permission only and you may also require approval under the Building Regulations. If you are in any doubt about this you can get further information via https://www.merton.gov.uk/planning-and-buildings/building-control  or by emailing building.control@merton.gov.uk.

Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE
The applicant should be aware that the site may provide a useful habitat for swifts. Swifts are currently in decline in the UK and in order to encourage and improve the conservation of swifts the applicant is advised to consider the installation of swift nesting box/bricks on site.
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A REAR DORMER ROOF EXTENSION AND 2 FRONT ROOFLIGHTS.
